column4: Ok, Installed Ubuntu on my wifes machine. Followed the sound troubleshooting wiki. Everything checks out. The mixer seems to work. Sound works on an alternate partition in windows. The drivers are loaded, the sound card is supported etc... you just hear nothing. How would I go about addressing this
i would check the hardware, make sure everything's plugged in right
Sound comes out of the speakers when booted in windows. That cant possibly be it
